title: A large-scale traveling ionospheric disturbance during the magnetic storm of 15 September 1999

references.title: A global study of large scale travelling ionospheric disturbances (TIDs) following a step-like onset of auroral substorms in both hemispheres,
references.raw: Hajkowicz, L. A., A global study of large scale travelling ionospheric disturbances (TIDs) following a step-like onset of auroral substorms in both hemispheres, Planet. Space Sci., 38, 913–923, 1990.

references.title: A low-latitude ionosphere-plasmasphere model,
references.raw: Bailey, G. J., N. Balan, A low-latitude ionosphere-plasmasphere model, in STEP Handbook, edited by R. W. Schunk, p. 173, Utah State Univ., Logan, 1996.

references.title: A review of atmospheric gravity waves and traveling ionospheric disturbances: 1982–1995,
references.raw: Hocke, K., and K. Schlegel, A review of atmospheric gravity waves and traveling ionospheric disturbances: 1982–1995, Ann. Geophys., 14, 917–940, 1996.

references.title: A simultaneous observation of large-scale periodic TIDs in both hemispheres following an onset of auroral disturbances,
references.raw: Hajkowicz, L. A., and R. D. Hunsucker, A simultaneous observation of large-scale periodic TIDs in both hemispheres following an onset of auroral disturbances, Planet. Space Sci., 35, 785–791, 1987.

references.title: Assimilative mapping of ionospheric electrodynamics in the thermosphere-ionosphere general circulation model comparisons with global ionospheric and thermospheric observations during the GEM/

references.raw: Emery, B. A., et al., Assimilative mapping of ionospheric electrodynamics in the thermosphere-ionosphere general circulation model comparisons with global ionospheric and thermospheric observations during the GEM/ SUNDIAL period of March 28–29, 1992, J. Geophys. Res., 101, 26,681–26,696, 1996.

references.title: Atmospheric gravity waves generated in the high-latitude ionosphere: A review,
references.raw: Hunsucker, R. D., Atmospheric gravity waves generated in the high-latitude ionosphere: A review, Rev. Geophys., 20, 293–315, 1982.

references.title: Comparison of models and measurements at Millstone Hill during the January 24–26, 1993, minor storm interval,
references.raw: Buonsanto, M. J., M. Codrescu, B. A. Emery, C. G. Fesen, T. J. FullerRowell, D. J. Melendez-Alvira, and D. P. Sipler, Comparison of models and measurements at Millstone Hill during the January 24–26, 1993, minor storm interval, J. Geophys. Res., 102, 7267–7277, 1997.

references.title: Estimation of ionospheric electric fields, ionospheric currents, and field-aligned currents from ground magnetic records,
references.raw: Kamide, Y., A. D. Richmond, and S. Matsushita, Estimation of ionospheric electric fields, ionospheric currents, and field-aligned currents from ground magnetic records, J. Geophys. Res., 86, 801–813, 1981. Lu, G., A. D. Richmond, R. G. Roble, and B. A. Emery, Coexistence of ionospheric positive and negative storm phases under northern winter conditions: A case study, J. Geophys. Res., 106, 24,493–24,504,

references.title: Global ionosphere perturbations monitored by the worldwide GPS network,
references.raw: Ho, C. M., A. J. Mannucci, U. J. Lindqwister, X. Pi, and B. T. Tsurutani, Global ionosphere perturbations monitored by the worldwide GPS network, Geophys. Res. Lett., 23, 3219–3222, 1996.

references.title: Global propagation of atmospheric gravity waves: A review,
references.raw: Francis, S. H., Global propagation of atmospheric gravity waves: A review, J. Atmos. Terr. Phys., 37, 1011–1054, 1975.

references.title: Global variations of thermospheric winds and temperatures caused by substorm energy injection,
references.raw: Fujiwara, H., S. Maeda, H. Fukunishi, T. J. Fuller-Rowell, and D. S. Evans, Global variations of thermospheric winds and temperatures caused by substorm energy injection, J. Geophys. Res., 101, 225–239, 1996.

references.title: Ionospheric irregularities produced by internal atmospheric gravity waves,
references.raw: Hooke, W. H., Ionospheric irregularities produced by internal atmospheric gravity waves, J. Atmos. Terr. Phys., 30, 795–823, 1968.

references.title: Ionospheric total electron content perturbations monitored by the GPS global network during two Northern Hemisphere winter storms,
references.raw: Ho, C. M., A. J. Mannucci, L. Sparks, X. Pi, U. L. Lindqwister, B. D. Wilson, B. A. Iijima, and M. J. Reyes, Ionospheric total electron content perturbations monitored by the GPS global network during two Northern Hemisphere winter storms, J. Geophys. Res., 103, 26,409–26,420, 1998.

references.title: Morphology of large-scale traveling atmospheric disturbances in the polar thermosphere,
references.raw: Balthazor, R. L., and R. J. Moffett, Morphology of large-scale traveling atmospheric disturbances in the polar thermosphere, J. Geophys. Res., 104, 15–24, 1999.

references.title: Observation of large-scale traveling ionospheric disturbances of auroral origin by global GPS networks,
references.raw: Afraimovich, E. L., E. A. Kosogorov, L. A. Leonovich, K. S. Palamartchouk, N. P. Perevalova, and O. M. Pirog, Observation of large-scale traveling ionospheric disturbances of auroral origin by global GPS networks, Earth Planets Space, 52, 669–674, 2000.

references.title: Plasmaspheric electron content in the GPS ray paths over
Plasmaspheric electron content in the GPS ray paths over Japan, Earth Planets Space,
references.raw: Balan, N., Y. Otsuka, T. Tsugawa, S. Miyazaki, T. Ogawa, and K. Shiokawa, Plasmaspheric electron content in the GPS ray paths over Japan, Earth Planets Space, 54, 71–79, 2002.

references.title: Response of the thermosphere and ionosphere to geomagnetic storms,
references.raw: Fuller-Rowell, T. J., M. V. Codrescu, R. J. Moffett, and S. Quegan, Response of the thermosphere and ionosphere to geomagnetic storms, J. Geophys. Res., 99, 3893–3914, 1994.

references.title: Revised global model of thermosphere winds using satellite and ground-based observations,
references.raw: Hedin, A. E., et al., Revised global model of thermosphere winds using satellite and ground-based observations, J. Geophys. Res., 96,7 6 5 7 – 7688, 1991.

references.title: thermospheric model,
references.raw: Hedin, A. E., MSIS-86 thermospheric model, J. Geophys. Res., 92, 4649– 4662, 1987.

references.title: Time dependent thermospheric neutral response to the 2–11
references.raw: Emery, B. A., C. Lathuillere, P. G. Richards, R. G. Roble, M. J. Buonsanto, D. J. Knipp, P. Wilkinson, D. P. Sipler, and R. Niciejewski, Time dependent thermospheric neutral response to the 2–11 November 1993 storm period, J. Atmos. Solar-Terr. Phys., 61, 329–350, 1999.
